posts.post_content:
Please read the caveats section below before buying. Thanks

For Sale:


Caveats

1. I post large, hi res images of the front and back of every card. If you want the original photo file (larger image), send me a PM, and I will be happy to email it to you. 

2. If a card I am selling was cracked out of a PSA/SGC/BVG/GAI holder, I will note that in the listing. If the person I bought the card from told me it was trimmed or altered in any way, I will note that. 

3. If you are concerned a card might be altered or trimmed, I'd suggest passing on the listing. I don't have a ruler to measure cards, and I am only concerned that they are authentic. Your mileage may vary.

4. All listed prices include shipping. I ship in cardsavers in a bubble mailer, USPS first class. Because I do not trust the blue dropboxes (and the mail is broken here), I drop off every package at the post office in person and I receive an acceptance scan. If the post office loses it after that, I obviously can't control that, but I can assure you that your mailer is being handed to someone in a post office, not dropped into a box outside. 

5. Due to COVID worries, I usually only go to the post office once per week, usually on Tuesdays. Subject to change.

6. I only accept Paypal FF.

7. Offers always welcome, and I will almost always counteroffer at a minimum. Also open to trades

8. If you have questions, please send a PM. Thanks

Sold Pile

8/18 update: added a Schlei batting Sov 460 and a well loved Murphy batting that is either a 350 or a 350/460. 

Thanks.
If Bergen PB is available, I'll take it.

[quote name="Lobo Aullando" post=2135591]If Bergen PB is available, I'll take it.[/QUOTE]

He is all yours. Send me a PM or email. Thanks!
2 new cards added, enjoy
small price drop on the joss and kleinow.
price drop on Addie
added in a bunch of Piedmont/SweetCaps from my trade thread into the for sale section. Enjoy.
I’ll claim Spade. PM sent
Pm sent
list is updated with what remains, with price drops included. headed to the post office in a few mins, if anyone wants to treat themselves before this long weekend. Stay safe out there.
PM sent on the Joss

added Shag to the for sale pile and dropped the price slightly on Carr, since I was able to pick up a raw copy, more willing to let this one go. 

There is another Shag SGC 2 listed on ebay right now for $850 and the 3's are going for $1000+. You are getting a bargain here.

Small price drop on all 3. If the Devlin doesn't sell, then I will probably end up keeping it and cracking it out for my raw collection, its a very nice copy.

I'm willing to trade the Shag for a lower grade raw Shag + other stuff, or just for a bunch of other stuff. I don't have to explain his scarcity and value, obviously.
added a lovely Stovall Batting Old Mill to the mix. PSA pop of 15 on this beauty.
I’ll take the Carr per PM.
bump with a little price drop. Should be adding new cards to the list next week
I'll take the Stovall if still available.
Stovall has departed the depot, but we've added a George Bell Follow Through to the pile
I’ll take Mr. Bell

[quote name="chrisn28" post=2145531]I’ll take Mr. Bell[/QUOTE]

Nice pick up, Chris. I’m going through the “B’s” right now. Was excited to see Bell, but it’s the other pose I need.
3 cards added. The Lake No Ball Tolstoi is a PSA pop 11, nice raw copy here.
I’ll take Atz

I've added a bunch of new cards to the first post. 

A few of the Polar Bears are lower pop (Bescher, Gasper, Groom) and the Clark Tolstoi is a PSA pop 4, really really difficult card to find
bump with price drops
I will take Bliss and Street - PM'ing
First post updated. Still lots of gems available. Don't be shy
Price drops for all listed cards.

small price drops on the remaining cards. Headed to the post office this afternoon, so if you want to treat yourself, go ahead and grab one of these remaining gems.
I’ll take the Davis. Sending PM
prices dropped
prices reduced
only Bowerman remains. Price dropped

new cards added. Have a splendid weekend.
